title: The Drinker Recommends... Boiling Point
description:
Every once in a while, something a bit special comes along. Boiling Point is such a movie. Starring Stephen Graham and Jason Flemyng, it tells the story of a chef struggling to hold it together in a busy London restaurant as events spiral out of control around him.
